meanings.sent1: After running up the stairs, he felt pursy and had to catch his breath.
meanings.sent2: The old dog was pursy after chasing the ball for a few minutes.
meanings.sent3: The pursy squirrel tried to keep up with the others but soon needed a break.
meanings.sent4: His pursy lungs struggled to keep pace with his friends during the race.
meanings.sent5: The pursy child panted heavily after playing tag for just a few minutes.

meanings.sent1: The pursy cat lazily stretched out, showing off its round belly.
meanings.sent2: The baker's apron made him look even more pursy than usual.
meanings.sent3: The pursy piglet waddled around the farm, its belly swaying with each step.
meanings.sent4: The pursy man struggled to bend over and tie his shoes due to his large belly.
meanings.sent5: The pursy puppy rolled over, revealing its chubby belly for a belly rub.

meanings.sent1: The pursy mayor strutted around town, acting as if he owned the place.
meanings.sent2: She always avoided the pursy professor who loved to hear himself talk.
meanings.sent3: The pursy peacock paraded around, showing off its colorful feathers to everyone.
meanings.sent4: The pursy boss made sure everyone knew he was in charge at the office.
meanings.sent5: The pursy queen looked down her nose at anyone she deemed unworthy of her presence.
